Reviews.Content: 3 days prepare trip home 12 home california trip fly random set circumstances mira mesa late decided stay near sd airport instead family huntington beach putting 1 12 hours closer destination luck deal quality inn cleaner suite hyatt previous week 30 cheaper cleaning crew paid dothey clean dont look nice dusting people dont pay attention details job ladies sized comfortable king bed desk workplace round glass table 2 fat chairsand television entertainment center plenty storage space traveler ie closet drawers shelves placed effective space lucky location 15 freeway perfect 150 washed dried load clothes detergent 1 front desk staff professional friendly rocky mountain please staff sir hard noticed appreciated thank jeff scott becker native southern californian home 43 birthday
